channel.title: Dedicated Mac OSX Client build potential issues
channel.description:
We are currently fixing some issues that some users detected regarding the recently released dedicated Mac OSX Client build. If you encounter issues, in the meantime you can use the previous Mac OSX Wine Build using this download link: https://www.davtonia.com/bitbay/bitbay.zip.
Thank you for your understanding! :slight_smile:
